creator: mikael.staldal@home.se
text:
It's possible to set an XMLReader in a 
org.apache.batik.transcoder.TranscoderInput, but that is not implemented in 
org.apache.batik.transcoder.XMLAbstractTranscoder#transcode(TranscoderInput, 
TranscoderOutput) as it should be.

The description of what to do is not clear.
Investigate later...
creator: tkormann@apache.org
deweese@apache.org
text: I believe this is now implemented.
